about.details:
Incorporated in 1976, Flair Writing Industries Limited develops and manufactures writing instruments including a variety of pens (ball pens, fountain pens, gel pens, roller pens, and metal pens). The company owns several brands, including FLAIR, HAUSER, PIERRE CARDIN, FLAIR CREATIVE, FLAIR HOUSEWARE, and ZOOX. The company manufactures and distributes writing instruments including pens, stationery products, and calculators.

The company also offers watercolors, crayons, sketch pens, erasers, wooden pencils, and geometry boxes, fine liners, sharpeners, and scales. Flair offered 727 different products as of June 30, 2023.

The company has also recently entered the household goods sector, including casseroles, bottles, storage containers, serving solutions, cleaning solutions, baskets, and paper bins. This expansion was made possible through one of the subsidiaries, FWEPL.

The company manufactures pens and other products from 11 manufacturing plants located in Valsad, Gujarat; in Naigaon (near Mumbai), Maharashtra; in Daman, Union Territory of Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu; and Dehradun, Uttarakhand.

Flair Writing Industries had a retail distributor presence in 2,424 cities, towns, and villages in India, as of June 30, 2023. In addition to traditional sales channels, Flair has modern retail stores and e-commerce platforms. As of June 30, 2023, the company has 54 international sales partners and distribution partners in 77 countries. As of June 30, 2023, the company had 5,899 full-time employees.

faqs.question: What is the Flair Writing IPO?
faqs.answer:
Flair Writing IPO is a main-board IPO of 19506578 equity shares of the face value of ₹5 aggregating up to ₹593.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹304 per share. The minimum order quantity is 49.

The IPO opens on November 22, 2023, and closes on November 24, 2023.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Flair Writing IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Flair Writing IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Flair Writing IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Flair Writing IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Flair Writing IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Flair Writing IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Flair Writing IPO opens on November 22, 2023 and closes on November 24, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Flair Writing IPO?
faqs.answer: Flair Writing IPO lot size is 49, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,896.

faqs.question: How to apply for Flair Writing IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Flair Writing IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Flair Writing IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Flair Writing IPO will be done on Wednesday, November 29, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, November 30, 2023. Check the Flair Writing IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Flair Writing IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Flair Writing IPO listing date is on Friday, December 1, 2023.
